import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get event types by IDs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/events/types/ids"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns event type records for the supplied list of type UUIDs. Use this when you already have identifiers and need to hydrate labels or scope metadata.

**Prerequisites**
1. **EventTypeIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/events/types/query](/docs/api/events/get-event-types-by-query-post) and extract `Items[].EventTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Query types: [POST /api/v1.0/events/types/query](/docs/api/events/get-event-types-by-query-post) -&gt; extract `Items[].EventTypeId`.
2. Fetch by IDs: [GET /api/v1.0/events/types/ids](/docs/api/events/get-event-types-by-ids) with the ID array.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Array of EventTypeId values in the request body.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Items retrieved.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing a list of event types.","properties":{"Items":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Event type/category for categorizing events.","properties":{"EventTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the event type."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date when the event type was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date when the event type was last modified."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the event type is deleted (soft delete)."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site scope for site-specific event types."},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["All","System","Global","Site","App","User","Role","Team"],"description":"Visibility scope of the event type."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the event type."},"Icon":{"type":"string","description":"Icon identifier for the event type."}},"title":"EventType"}},"Paging":{"type":"object","description":"Pagination details returned with paged user search results.","properties":{"TotalRows":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of rows available across all pages.","example":54343},"PageCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of pages available for the current query.","example":10869},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of records returned per page.","example":5},"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","description":"Zero-based index of the current page returned in the response.","example":0}},"title":"PagingMetadata"},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned >
  
</StatusCodes>
